description: A single AssistantAgent (with a calculator tool) in a RoundRobinGroupChat team.
label: RoundRobin Team

participants.description: An agent that provides assistance with tool use.
participants.label: Researcher Agent.

config.name: assistant_agent

model_client.description: Local Mistral-7B model client for instruction-based generation (Ollama, LMStudio).
model_client.label: Mistral-7B Local

workbench.description:
A workbench that provides a static set of tools that do not change after
    each tool execution.
workbench.label: StaticWorkbench

tools.description: Create custom tools by wrapping standard Python functions.
tools.label: FunctionTool

config.name: calculator
config.description: A simple calculator that performs basic arithmetic operations

model_context.description: An unbounded chat completion context that keeps a view of the all the messages.
model_context.label: UnboundedChatCompletionContext

config.description: An agent that provides assistance with ability to use tools.
config.system_message:
You are a highly skilled research assistant. Your task is to research the given topic in-depth, 
 synthesize relevant information, and present it in approximately 10 concise, well-organized bullet points.
 Be sure to focus on providing factual, accurate, and up-to-date information, and avoid unnecessary jargon.

participants.description: An agent that provides assistance with ability to use tools.
participants.label: Summarizer Agent

config.description: An agent that provides assistance with ability to use tools.
config.system_message:
Your goal is to summarize research notes received from the Researcher Agent. 
Follow these instructions automatically:
1. Create a 3â€“5 sentence concise summary of the research.
2. Extract 5 key bullet points capturing the most important insights.
3. Make it clear, factual, and readable.. When done, say TERMINATE.

config.name: calculator

model_context.description: An unbounded chat completion context that keeps a view of the all the messages.

config.description: An agent that provides assistance with ability to use tools.
config.system_message:
Your goal is to print the summary and then print "Noted" to indicate that the task is complete. 
Follow these steps automatically:
1. Print the summary received from the Summarizer Agent 
2. After printing the summary, print the word "NOTED to signify the task is finished.
When done, say TERMINATE.

conditions.description: Terminate the conversation if a specific text is mentioned.
conditions.label: TextMentionTermination

conditions.description: Terminate the conversation after a maximum number of messages have been exchanged.
conditions.label: MaxMessageTermination
